label: Inland Hubs
description: Inland hubs are either large patches (>2,000 ha) of highest priority Blueprint areas or large patches of permanently protected lands.

label: Inland Corridors
description: Inland corridors are the shortest paths that connect these hubs while routing through as much Blueprint priority as possible.

label: Marine Hubs
description: Marine hubs are either large patches (>2,000 ha) of highest priority Blueprint areas or large patches of open water estuaries.

label: Marine Corridors
description: Marine corridors are the shortest paths that connect these hubs while routing through as much Blueprint priority as possible.
